# iosxe_interface_ipv6_pim (Data Source)

This data source can read the Interface IPv6 PIM configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxe_interface_ipv6_pim" "example" {
  type = "Loopback"
  name = "100"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `type` (String) Interface type

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `bfd` (Boolean) Configure BFD
- `bsr_border` (Boolean) Border of PIM BSR domain
- `dr_priority` (Number) PIM Hello DR priority
- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `pim` (Boolean) PIM interface commands
